p: Hydroxychloroquine is different from chloroquine since it has hydroxyl group at the end of the side chain. This molecule can be ingested orally as hydroxychloroquine sulfate. The pharmacokinetics of hydroxychloroquine resembles that of chloroquine, having a rapid gastrointestinal absorption and elimination by the kidney. Hydroxychloroquine has a good tolerance and can be used in high doses for long periods [ 56].
